content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: It's a delight to have you interested in this wonderful apartment, Ms. Wang. However, let's focus solely on the rental price for now. Given its prime location and top-notch facilities, I am expecting a premium price. Let's begin negotiations from 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point because I believe the current offer is significantly higher than what a comparable, yet slightly less central, unfurnished apartment would cost. I'm seeking a more reasonable rate due to the current economic context and my status as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As landlord Peter Schmidt, reluctantly responding: I understand your situation, but this apartment's unique features and central location make it stand out from other properties. If you're set on finding something more affordable, I'm afraid this may not be the right fit for you. TERMINATE (The negotiation ends since a mutual agreement could not be reached.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
